page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content: PEOPLE IN REDDITCH HAVE MANY INTERESTING PLACES TO VISIT AND EVENTS TO ATTEND.WITHIN THIS DISTRICT THERE ARE A NUMBER OF RECENT IMMIGRANTS FROM PAKISTAN.THE GIRLS IN SCHOOL WEAR LONG FLOWING ROBES TO COVER THEIR LIMBS,THESE COSTUMES USE BEAUTIFUL SILKS WITH BRIGHT FLOWERY PATTERNS.WHEN THE OLDER GIRLS WISH TO MARRY IT IS COMMON FOR THE PARENTS TO HAVE THE GREATEST SAY IN THE CHOICE OF HUSBAND.THE REST OF THE POPULATION IS A MIXTURE OF FAMILIES WHO HAVE LIVED IN THE AREA FOR SEVERAL GENERATIONS,AND FAMILIES WHO HAVE MOVED TO REDDITCH IN SEARCH OF WORK IN THE NEW FACTORIES.THERE ARE MANY PLACES OF ENTERTAINMENT FOR ALL AGES
